alert.note: Alert for Nemaha; Richardson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 20 at 3:55AM CDT until April 20 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN NEMAHA AND RICHARDSON COUNTIES... At 354 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Verdon, or 8 miles northwest of Falls City, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Falls City, Rulo, Verdon, Stella, Shubert, Dawson, Salem, Preston, Barada, Sac and Fox Nation Reservation, Indian Cave State Park, The Highway 75 And 8 Junction and Iowa Reservation of Kansas and Nebraska. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
